description:
To search in Wikipedia enter the keyword(default is 'w') and your request after a space. You can also specify a language different from the default by adding to the keyword sign '-' and the language code.
Example 1: 'w gnome' - look for the 'gnome' in Wikipedia specified by default in the configuration of extension.
Example 2: 'w-es gnome' - will look for the 'gnome' in the Spanish Wikipedia.
Shortcuts:
<Super>w - to seach from clipboard
<Super><Shift>w - to seach from primary selection(requires xclip)
name: Wikipedia Search Provider
